entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,411Chapters: 2/22Kudos: 6

Summary: Evan – Buck – Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what’s left of his savings while going to college won’t keep him fed, though… but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he’s made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he’s always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose – the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can’t get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides?

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 152,125Chapters: 66/?Kudos: 1,308

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: I could stay in your room forever
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,870Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 839

Summary: "What was it, Buck? Guilt? Disgust? You couldn’t get over your own actions of bringing your horrible, racist ex-boyfriend back to the house I used to live in with my son, and let him fuck you on the mattress I used to sleep on?”Buck got up, clawing at the wall for stability, legs shaky. His entire face was tilted into a sneer. “I didn’t let Tommy fuck me. I had him down on his knees while I closed my eyes and thought about you.”   Buck gets shitfaced with Ravi at a gay club during pride, and shows up on Eddie's doorstep, forgetting that he doesn't live there anymore.

entry.title: for a while you were all mine
entry.summary:
Author: sealedmyfate

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,775Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: He, Eddie Diaz, is not getting out of this alive.  One thing categorized and sorted. Buck is the category Eddie has no idea what to do with and his brain stalls. He doesn’t want to lie to Buck, especially if it’s the last time he’s ever going to talk to him. But he cannot have Buck come down here. There isn’t time for it and there’s not a thing Buck can do for Eddie. That was category one. Eddie is already dead. He cannot drag Buck down with him. So Eddie has to make a choice. Lie to Buck and ensure he makes it to safety, or take the opportunity to say some final words to his best friend. He knows the choice he wants to make, but he also knows the choice he has to make. Because he knows Buck to his core. or the fic where the universe decides to scream at Eddie Diaz by trapping him in a time loop where he is forced to watch his best friend die every day with no power to stop it.

entry.title: Please Don't Stay
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,912Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: “Hey, baby, you with me?” Eddie asked, squatting down in front of her, taking both of her hands in his as he watched her face, expression still blank, “Evie? Evie, you there baby?” He tried again, but got no response out of her. He reached out and placed a gentle hand on her cheek, gently stroking his thumb back and forth, “Evie, I need you to come back.” At that Buck leant into the contact, eyes slipping shut as she relaxed into her husband’s hand, “Good girl.” He praised, “Good job. Can you squeeze my hand for me?” She followed his instructions and gave a light squeeze, “You’re doing so well sweetheart. Can you open your eyes? I want to see those pretty blues.” Her eyes fluttered open and Eddie couldn’t stop the smile that overtook his face, “Hello beautiful.”“Hi.” She whispered, causing Eddie to grin even harder. “Can you tell me what happened?” He asked. Buck looked over Eddie’s shoulder so she could see where they’d been standing minutes before, “That’s Adam.” or Buck's first call back from her and Eddie's honeymoon leads to the return of a familiar face and old flame, and her family aren't too happy about it to put it mildly.

entry.title: you could be my baby, baby, baby
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,836Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 611

Summary: “My mom said, uh, that his name was Buck. That he was going to go to the fire academy and that he had a—” she broke off, rubbing her own forehead, exactly where his skin went pink. “She said he went by Firehose.” Buck didn’t need all of his coworkers to look at him in alarm; he was pretty sure he’d gone deadly pale. His daughter knew four things about him, and one of them was his old tinder profile handle. He felt a little like he was going to die. “She’s got your eyes,” Eddie commented, unhelpfully. ---- Buck finds out he has a daughter, and also a stupidly big crush on his best friend. It's an adjustment.

entry.title: A Tablespoon Of Tease: Eddie's Special Touch
entry.summary:
Author: buddiesongfic

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 308Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: “Anyway,” Eddie cut him off lightly, slipping free like nothing happened. He peered into the bowl of marinara on the counter. “I think the sauce needs more brown sugar.”Buck blinked at him, still reeling, the grater hanging useless in his hand. “You—you can’t just—kiss my ear and then critique the sauce, Eddie!” His voice cracked again, half outrage, half something else he couldn’t name.OR; After Bobby passes, Buck makes Cap's special lasagna, but with Eddie's final touch to the recipe (or something)
